title: panca sAyaka
sahitya:
panca sAyaka janakan shrI padmanAbhan mukundan ancitE simhAsanE ezhunnaruLITunnu yAnE


anupallavi

  vAnOru makkAlam divi vannativElam shrI nAyaka caraNE malar citarunnala maruNE


caraNam 1    vara bhUSaNa maNiyum shrI hari tan tanuruciyum sura nArikaL kaNDum sarasam trapapUNDum
    caraNam 2    manujAvali sahasA vandu maduvairiyE shirasA kanivODu stuticcum irukai kUppi namiccum
    caraNam 3    nAdAmrdtu nirayunnoru navavAditra nirayum mOdEna nirannum gatibhEdangaL tuDarnum
